label: Influencer Discovery & Vetting
description: AI-powered influencer identification with audience authenticity analysis and brand alignment scoring improving campaign performance by 40-70% through data-driven partner selection.

traditional.workflow: 1. Marketing manager manually searches Instagram for influencers in brand category. 2. Evaluate influencers based primarily on follower count. 3. Limited vetting (review recent posts, check basic engagement). 4. No systematic analysis of audience authenticity or fake followers. 5. Work with same 5-10 influencers repeatedly (limited discovery of new talent).
constraints: Manual search limited to 5-10 influencers (miss micro-influencer opportunities)
Follower count poor proxy for engagement (fake followers common)
No audience authenticity verification (bot followers, engagement pods)
Can't assess brand alignment systematically
Miss emerging creators with high engagement but lower follower counts
No database of vetted influencers for future campaigns

agentic.workflow: 1. Influencer Discovery Agent searches across platforms using: category and content relevance, audience demographics match (age, location, interests), engagement rate thresholds (not just follower count), content quality and production value. 2. Audience Analysis Agent evaluates authenticity: fake follower detection (bot patterns, inactive accounts), engagement quality (comments vs generic reactions), audience demographics and psychographics, follower growth patterns (organic vs purchased). 3. Brand Alignment Agent scores fit: content topics and values alignment, past brand partnerships (competing vs complementary), audience sentiment toward influencer, controversy and risk screening. 4. Performance Prediction estimates campaign ROI based on historical data. 5. Database Agent maintains vetted influencer profiles for future campaigns.
dataSources: Social media influencer profiles across platforms
Follower authenticity and bot detection signals
Content topics and brand safety analysis
benefits: 40-70% campaign performance improvement through data-driven selection
100-500 vetted influencer pool vs 5-10 manual relationships
Fake follower detection prevents wasted spend (20-30% savings)
Micro-influencer discovery yields 3-5x higher engagement rates
Brand alignment scoring reduces partnership risks
Audience authenticity ensures real reach and impact

quickWins: Build influencer database with engagement metrics

label: Campaign Management & Tracking
description: AI-assisted campaign workflow with content approval and performance tracking reducing campaign management time by 60-80% while ensuring brand compliance and measuring ROI.

traditional.workflow: 1. Marketing manager manually creates campaign brief in document. 2. Email brief to 5-10 influencers individually. 3. Influencers send draft content via email or DM for approval. 4. Manually review each piece of content for brand compliance. 5. Track campaign performance by manually checking posts and recording metrics in spreadsheet.
constraints: Manual brief creation doesn't scale beyond 5-10 influencers
Email-based workflow creates version control issues
Content approval bottleneck (2-3 days per review cycle)
Manual performance tracking limited to post-level metrics
Can't track traffic, conversions, or revenue attribution
Campaign management takes 15-20 hours per campaign

agentic.workflow: 1. Brief Generation Agent creates campaign briefs using: brand guidelines and messaging, product information and key features, campaign goals and deliverables, legal requirements (FTC disclosure, rights). 2. Collaboration Agent manages influencer workflow: distribute briefs through platform, track deliverable submissions, manage revision requests. 3. Content Approval Agent pre-screens submissions: brand guideline compliance check, FTC disclosure verification, prohibited content detection, sentiment and tone analysis. 4. Performance Tracking Agent monitors: content engagement (likes, comments, shares), traffic driven to brand sites, conversion and revenue attribution, cost per acquisition and ROI. 5. Reporting Agent creates campaign performance dashboards.
benefits: 60-80% reduction in campaign management time (3-5 hrs vs 15-20 hrs)
Scaled influencer capacity (50-100 vs 5-10 manual)
Automated brand compliance checking reduces approval time to hours
Full attribution tracking shows traffic, conversions, and revenue
Centralized workflow eliminates email/spreadsheet chaos
Real-time performance dashboards vs manual spreadsheet tracking

traditional.workflow: 1. Affiliate manager manually reviews affiliate applications (20-30 per month). 2. Manually generate tracking links for each approved affiliate. 3. Single flat commission rate for all affiliates (no performance tiers). 4. Send monthly email newsletter to all affiliates with promotions. 5. Limited to 50-100 active affiliates due to manual management constraints.
constraints: Manual application review limits intake to 20-30/month
Flat commission doesn't reward top performers or incentivize growth
Manual link generation creates bottleneck and errors
One-size-fits-all communication doesn't engage diverse affiliate types
Can't scale beyond 50-100 affiliates with manual management
No systematic affiliate performance analysis or optimization

agentic.workflow: 1. Affiliate Recruitment Agent evaluates applications using: website traffic and content quality, audience demographics and relevance, content topics and brand alignment, historical performance indicators (if available). 2. Auto-Approval Agent accepts qualified affiliates instantly based on scoring thresholds. 3. Link Generation Agent creates unique tracking links: product-specific deep links, campaign-specific promotions, custom vanity URLs. 4. Tiered Commission Agent assigns commission levels: bronze tier (5% for new affiliates), silver tier (8% for $10K+ monthly sales), gold tier (12% for $50K+ monthly sales), bonus incentives for growth milestones. 5. 500+ active affiliates vs 50-100 manual management limit
Tiered commissions reward top performers and incentivize growth
Automated link generation eliminates bottleneck and errors

Top-performing affiliates drive 60-80% of affiliate revenue

Manually calculate commission for each affiliate based on tier and sales volume. 4. Create payout batch in PayPal or accounting system. 5. Process takes 3-5 days monthly, prone to calculation errors and disputes.

Commission calculation errors create affiliate disputes
3-5 day processing time frustrates top performers

Limited to monthly payout cycles (can't do more frequent payouts)

label: Performance Analytics & Attribution
description: AI-powered attribution modeling with incrementality testing measuring true influencer and affiliate ROI improving marketing spend efficiency by 30-50%.

traditional.workflow: 1. Affiliate manager reviews last-click attribution in affiliate platform. 2. Calculate basic ROI (commission paid vs revenue attributed). 3. No visibility into cross-channel influence (influencer drives awareness, customer converts via search). 4. Can't measure incrementality (would customer have purchased anyway?). 5. Attribution window fixed at 30 days (miss longer customer journeys).
constraints: Last-click attribution misses influencer role in customer journey
Can't differentiate incremental sales from baseline conversions
Fixed 30-day window doesn't match actual purchase behavior
No cross-channel view (social, search, direct interaction)
Over-credit bottom-funnel affiliates (coupon sites, loyalty portals)
Under-credit top-funnel influencers driving awareness and consideration

agentic.workflow: 1. Multi-Touch Attribution Agent tracks full customer journey: influencer content exposure (impressions, views), engagement signals (clicks, site visits), cross-channel touchpoints (social, search, email), final conversion attribution. 2. Incrementality Analysis Agent measures true lift: test groups (exposed to influencer/affiliate) vs control, compare conversion rates and basket sizes, identify incremental revenue (vs baseline). 3. Channel Contribution Agent allocates credit: position-based model (40% first touch, 20% middle, 40% last), data-driven model (ML-based credit allocation), time-decay model (recent interactions weighted higher). 4. ROI Optimization Agent recommends budget allocation across partners. 5. Lifetime Value Agent measures long-term customer value from different channels.
benefits: 30-50% improvement in marketing spend efficiency
Multi-touch attribution reveals true influencer impact vs last-click
Incrementality testing identifies which channels drive new sales
Budget optimization allocates spend to highest ROI partners
Lifetime value measurement shows long-term channel effectiveness
Data-driven attribution models vs fixed last-click rules

quickWins: Run incrementality test on top influencers

label: Fraud Detection & Compliance
description: AI-powered click fraud detection with FTC disclosure monitoring and brand safety screening preventing 15-25% revenue loss from fraud and protecting brand reputation.

traditional.workflow: 1. Affiliate manager manually reviews suspicious activity only when flagged. 2. Check for FTC disclosure compliance by manually reviewing sample of influencer posts. 3. Limited ability to detect click fraud or cookie stuffing. 4. No systematic brand safety monitoring of affiliate websites. 5. Discover fraud after significant commission payouts (difficult to recover).
constraints: Reactive fraud detection after payouts made (10-20% revenue loss)
Manual FTC compliance review covers <10% of content
Click fraud and bots inflate metrics and commission costs
Cookie stuffing creates false attribution and overpayment
No brand safety screening (affiliates on inappropriate sites)
Limited recourse after fraudulent commissions paid

agentic.workflow: 1. Click Fraud Detection Agent identifies suspicious patterns: bot traffic and non-human clicks, click farms and VPN networks, unusual click-to-conversion ratios, duplicate transactions and cookie stuffing. 2. FTC Compliance Agent monitors disclosure requirements: verify proper disclosure language ('#ad', 'sponsored'), check disclosure placement (visible and clear), flag non-compliant content for correction, track historical compliance by influencer. 3. Brand Safety Agent screens affiliate content: identify inappropriate content or sites, detect competitor brand bidding violations, monitor trademark and policy compliance. 4. Risk Scoring Agent rates affiliates by fraud and compliance risk. 5. Enforcement Agent automatically: withhold payments for suspicious activity, send compliance reminders, terminate fraudulent affiliates.
benefits: 15-25% reduction in revenue loss from fraud prevention
100% FTC compliance monitoring vs <10% manual sampling
Proactive click fraud detection prevents overpayment
Brand safety screening protects reputation
Automated enforcement (payment holds, terminations)
Risk scoring identifies high-risk affiliates before issues

quickWins: Implement click fraud detection on top affiliates
